data.qoute: There is no path to happiness; happiness is the path.
data.author: Buddha

data.qoute: I have chosen to be happy because it's good for my health.
data.author: Voltaire

data.qoute: They say a person needs just three things to be truly happy in this world: Someone to love, something to do, and something to hope for.
data.author: Tom Bodett
